data.quote: It is not power that corrupts but fear. Fear of losing power corrupts those who wield it and fear of the scourge of power corrupts those who are subject to it.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: If you want to bring an end to long-standing conflict, you have to be prepared to compromise.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: If I were the blushing kind, I would blush to be called a hero.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: If I advocate cautious optimism it is not because I do not have faith in the future but because I do not want to encourage blind faith.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: By helping others, you will learn how to help yourselves.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: The only real prison is fear, and the only real freedom is freedom from fear.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: If you're feeling helpless, help someone.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: You should never let your fears prevent you from doing what you know is right.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
data.author: Lou Holtz
